[AddComponentMenu("Webflow/ProbabilityUtil")] public class ProbabilityUtil : MonoBehaviour Methods GetItem() Function to get a random item from all Game Object Lists. tip This function must be used to get the random item for your projects. Example: Reward through achievements. Declaration public GameObject GetItem() Returns Type Description UnityEngine.GameObject Unity GameObject GetItemListByIndex(Int32) Returns a specific list based on the index. Declaration public List<GameObject> GetItemListByIndex(int element) Parameters Type Name Description System.Int32 element Element of the list Returns Type Description System.Collections.Generic.List < UnityEngine.GameObject > List of GameObjects by index GetItemProbabilityOfListByIndex(Int32) Returns the probability of getting one of the objects from a specific list by index. Declaration public float GetItemProbabilityOfListByIndex(int index) Parameters Type Name Description System.Int32 index Index of list Returns Type Description System.Single Probability of list by index RemoveItemFromList(Int32) Removes the entire list from all lists. Declaration public void RemoveItemFromList(int element) Parameters Type Name Description System.Int32 element Element of the list SetItemListByIndex(List<GameObject>, Int32) Overwrites a list with GameObject in a specific place of the lists. Declaration public void SetItemListByIndex(List<GameObject> gameObjects, int element) Parameters Type Name Description System.Collections.Generic.List < UnityEngine.GameObject > gameObjects Unity GameObject System.Int32 element Element of the list SetWeightByIndex(Int32, Int32) Declaration public void SetWeightByIndex(int weight, int element) Parameters Type Name Description System.Int32 weight System.Int32 element

articles/intro.html.title: Welcome to webflow!
articles/intro.html.keywords: Welcome to webflow! The company webflow is a small company from Switzerland. The company was founded in 2020 and develops content for games. The company relies on the cross-platform game engine Unity.

index.html.title: Welcome to webflow!
index.html.keywords: Welcome to webflow! The company webflow is a small company based in Switzerland. The company was founded in 2020 and develops content for games. The company relies on the cross-platform game engine Unity. On this page you can find the documentation for the components.
